name: TermProj
description: ## Installation ### Configuring your database Take a look at the [database documentation](docs/mongo_schemas.md) for the required database collections and database users. Note that the database must be named "snake_irl"

scripts.dev-start: concurrently "cd src/frontend && npm start" "cd src/backend && npm start"
scripts.dev-install: npm install yarn && yarn install && cd src/frontend && yarn install && cd ../backend && yarn install
